item.title: IFF files a Writ Petition against MHAâ€™s refusal to provide information on electronic surveillance orders issued under the IT Act
item.description: We filed 6 RTI applications in Dec 2018 seeking information about Electronic Surveillance orders passed under Section 69 of the IT Act. Three years have passed since, and we apprehend that the information sought is being continuously destroyed during the pendency of the RTI proceedings.
